FDRules.GeneralRules1: Fortune Dragon is a 3-reel, 3-row video slot featuring multiplier reel up to x10 and Fortune Spins with expanded multiplier reel.
FDRules.GeneralRules2: The game is played with 5 bet lines (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
FDRules.GeneralRules3: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols.

FDMultiplierReel.Title: Multiplier Reel
FDMultiplierReel.MultiplierExplaination1: During any spin, the multiplier reel at the bottom of the reels will spin to reveal either blank, x2, x5 or x10.
FDMultiplierReel.MultiplierExplaination2: If the multiplier reel reveals x2, x5 or x10, all wins in that spin will be multiplied by the revealed multiplier before wins are paid.

FDFeature.Title: Fortune Dragon Feature
FDFeature.FreeSpinExplaination1: During any spin, the Fortune Dragon Feature with 8 Fortune Spins may be randomly triggered while the reels are spinning.
FDFeature.FreeSpinExplaination2: During the Fortune Dragon Feature, the multiplier reel will be expanded and 2 or 3 multipliers will be awarded for every Fortune spin.

SlotRulesShared.SureWinExplaination1: The Sure Win Bet option can be activated for each spin which increases the bet by 5x.
SlotRulesShared.SureWinExplaination2: Activating the Sure Win Bet will guarantee a win for every spin (excluding Fortune Spin).
SlotRulesShared.SureWinExplaination3: Current Bet Size and Bet Level will not be affected by the Sure Win Bet.
SlotRulesShared.SureWinExplaination4: The Sure Win Bet option can be activated and deactivated during the main game.

FDMaximumWin.MaxWinExplaination1: The maximum win amount is %{2500}x of the bet amount.
FDMaximumWin.MaxWinExplaination2: If the total win in the main game or the Fortune Dragon Feature reaches %{2500}x of the bet amount, the spin ends.

FDWinningBetLines.Title: Winning Bet Lines
FDWinningBetLines.WinningBetLinesExplaination1: Only the highest win per bet line is paid.
FDWinningBetLines.WinningBetLinesExplaination2: Bet lines win if the winning symbols are in succession from the leftmost reel to the right.
